title: So T. F.'s name is Tobias.
body:
Tobias F.

Did  you guys take an idea from dota 2 and start naming things after characters from _Arrested Development?_  

It's okay if you did. I won't be mad.

replies.body:
I'm one of a few big Arrested Development fans at Riot (just ask Gnar), but Funke is not T.F.'s last name.

Whether he wears jorts in the shower is a different matter.

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AQd6F4on,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-24T01:35:18.565+0000)
>
> I'm one of a few big Arrested Development fans at Riot

There are literally dozens of us!
I'm a bugger for ironic expressions of number, It works great in text. I like to compound my stupid.
Jaredan, just curious. Has Tobias always been TF's name or was this a more recent thing after the lore changes?
I think I can guess what Soraka's job is. Heh, Job.
I think the joke swooshed past my head.

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AQd6F4on,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-24T01:35:18.565+0000)
>
> I'm one of a few big Arrested Development fans at Riot (just ask Gnar), but Funke is not T.F.'s last name.
> 
> Whether he wears jorts in the shower is a different matter.

He's definitely a Never Nude though, right?
It makes sense from a card sharks perspective that he would hide his real name to those that he meets. After all, it's easier to con someone when they don't know a single thing about you :D

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AQd6F4on,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-24T01:35:18.565+0000)
>
> I'm one of a few big Arrested Development fans at Riot (just ask Gnar), but Funke is not T.F.'s last name.
> 
> Whether he wears jorts in the shower is a different matter.

Is his full name Tobias Fate?

Kinda like Miss Fortune's full name is Sarah Fortune and Vayne's is Shauna Vayne?
Why did you have to put his name in the title it could spoil it for those who haven't read it yet.
Let's just say that I'm grinning like a madman that we've finally gotten a name for the champion that's name is actually a title for the past five years.
Not suprised he has a alternate name, why would anyone give out their real name as shady as this story is?
